DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Metal Mania Kit - Gold
DescriptionData.Description:
Graftobian Metal Mania Kit in Gold includes all you need to create stunning metallic makeup effects. Become a completely gold Oscar statue, the girl from Goldfinger or use it for stunning eye and makeup effects. Just mix Graftobian Gold Cosmetic Powdered Metal with about double the amount of Graftobian Mixing & Lining Liquid.
Once the Powdered Metal Makeup is completely dry, it is a totally durable and completely opaque metallic coating. Use Graftobian Gold ColorSpray hair effects to coat your hair if you like. Removal is easy with soap and water.
Kit includes: 1 oz container of Powdered Metal in Silver, 0.5 oz Graftobian Magic Set Mixing Liquid and an application sponge.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: All you need to create stunning metallic makeup effects
mix Graftobian Gold Cosmetic Powdered Metal with about double the amount of Graftobian Mixing & Lining Liquid
Includes: 1 oz container of Powdered Metal in Gold, 0.5 oz Graftobian Magic Set Mixing Liquid and an application sponge.
